issue.title: [CF 881] How do i make a spell clickable?
issue.body:
How do i make the spells clickable?  Like a spell that is only clickable when it procs. Example would be Howling blast


> Posted by CurseForge user lilfuggert | Imported from CurseForge issue #881 | Raw

comments.body:
If you want to be able to click icons to cast a spell, this is not possible due to restrictions put in place by Blizzard in order to prevent addons from playing the game for you.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
